message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for $14,000. It's worth every penny, and I think you'll be very happy with it.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't afford $14,000 at the moment. I would like to propose an offer of $12,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your consideration.
